title: Update to fix bug
content:
There is a bug on v2.48.0 that prevents new tile creation on new empty tilemap layer.

Update to the latest version to fix that bug now.

title: -- HALLOWEEN SALE --
content:
Use code HALLOWEEN for 30% off now.

(This event lasts until the end of October)

title: Help needed
content:
If you have encountered a crash when inputting text in Pixquare on iOS 26, please let us know via Discord or email (info@pixquare.art).
We'd love to learn about how this happens and fix it.
Thank you so much
Pixquare Team.
